text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hey hey, Cafe. I tried whipping up a drink that has a bit of muscle-boosting effect...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Yes, just as you guessed. It’s absolutely not for drinking. No matter how much you might want it. Definitely not.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: What is it...? If you have no business, then please, go away...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmm, that didn’t work. There’s this thing called the “Caligula Effect,” where what’s forbidden is what you want the most...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
The fact that you’re not wanting the drink means — you clearly don’t fall under that.
Very disappointing, but I suppose I’ll look elsewhere.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You’ll try somewhere else, right...? Or is there still something else...?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Uhh~~n!! I guess it’s no good after all!!
